programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A family must face-off against a band of bloodthirsty, hill-dwelling cannibals after their trailer breaks down, stranding them in the desert(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: A hapless cubicle drone must defend himself against a new boss who's really a malevolent vampire, intent on populating the office with more of his kind(n)

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: On the first day of filming, zombies overrun a movie set(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this entertaining horror comedy, a demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A family must face-off against a band of bloodthirsty, hill-dwelling cannibals after their trailer breaks down, stranding them in the desert(n)

programme.title: Hesher
programme.desc: A bullied little boy grieving the death of his mother strikes up an unlikely friendship with a Metallica-loving anarchist in this tender yet unsentimental childhood drama. In the wake of his mother's recent death, 13-year-old TJ (Devin Brochu) finds the bumpy road to emotional recovery all the more difficult due to the dual facts that he's bullied at school and that his father (Rainn Wilson) has become a vacant pill-head. Just when it seems like things couldn't possibly get any worse, TJ strikes up an unusual friendship with Hesher (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), a greasy-haired anarchist with a beat-up van, homemade tattoos, and a soft spot for explosions. The next thing TJ knows, Hesher is sitting in his living room and watching porn on the family television. Later, though, just as TJ summons the courage to pursue a friendship with Nicole (Natalie Portman), a kindly grocery-store clerk who came to his aid in a time of need, an explosive discovery threatens to propel the embattled teen down a dangerous path of self-destruction(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy With W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: W. Kamua Bell hosts as some of the hottest comics take the stage at the SXSW festival. Appearing: Todd Glass; Wyatt Cenac; Iliza Shlesinger; Rachel Feinstein; Nate Bargatze; Matt Braunger; Mark Normand; Beth Stelling; Joe DeRosa; and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy With W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: W. Kamua Bell hosts as some of the hottest comics take the stage at the SXSW festival. Appearing: Todd Glass; Wyatt Cenac; Iliza Shlesinger; Rachel Feinstein; Nate Bargatze; Matt Braunger; Mark Normand; Beth Stelling; Joe DeRosa; and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teen girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: Emotionally devastated after learning that she's secretly referred to as "The DUFF" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) by the entire student body, high-school senior Bianca (Mae Whitman) dismisses the cautionary advice of her favorite teacher (Ken Jeong), turns her back on her longtime crush Toby (Nick Eversman), and enlists the help of charismatic jock Wesley (Robbie Amell) to help salvage what's left of her senior year. As the once-contented senior wages a monumental struggle to regain her confidence, she gradually turns her efforts toward knocking cruel class queen bee Madison (Bella Thorne) from her throne up on high. Based on the popular novel by Kody Keplinger(n)

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: After finding little in common with her fellow high-school students, Caroline Wexler sets her sights on a handsome young teacher, but complications arise when a stoner classmate falls in love with her(n)

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A writer falls for a French diplomat's wife, whose unorthodox rules limit their affair to between the hours of 5 and 7 pm. Unhappy with her time constraints, he must decide if the relationship is worth continuing in this sophisticated romantic comedy starring: Anton Yelchin, Bérénice Marlohe and Glenn Close(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: In this haunting thriller, a supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter(n)

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a club owner in a fight, ex-Navy seal Bobby Kalinowsky must fight for his life when the dead man's gangster brother puts a price on his head. Action(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: Emotionally devastated after learning that she's secretly referred to as "The DUFF" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) by the entire student body, high-school senior Bianca (Mae Whitman) dismisses the cautionary advice of her favorite teacher (Ken Jeong), turns her back on her longtime crush Toby (Nick Eversman), and enlists the help of charismatic jock Wesley (Robbie Amell) to help salvage what's left of her senior year. programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Harrowing docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A petty thief and his cohort, a recently orphaned teen boy, embark on a road trip adventure that involves multiple robberies and results in a strong connection between the two(n)

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: When a middle-aged man stuck in a comfortable but dull life befriends a young gay hustler, he must come to terms with the secret that's been hovering beneath the surface of his marriage(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: JFK --> LAX. It's a few years later as Season 5 begins and Hank is living in New York but hoping to relocate. His opportunity arrives via an invitation from Charlie to come to L.A. to write a screenplay for a project starring rapper-turned-actor Samurai Apocalypse. Upon his return, Hank reunites with Karen and her new husband and discovers Becca has a boyfriend who bears an uncanny resemblance to her father(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: The Way of the Fist. Hank passes on scripting rapper-actor Samurai Apocalypse's film, but the performer won't take no for an answer and drags Hank to a meeting with director Peter Berg, who has a lot more in common with Hank than they both care to admit. Later, Samurai decides to help an unwilling Becca sever ties with Tyler; and little Stuart causes problems at preschool when he flashes a girl classmate(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Boys & Girls. Hank finishes a draft of the film script, presents it to Samurai and proceeds to hit the road, but his attempts to leave hit a snag when he's asked to squire Kali around town. Meanwhile, a beat-up Tyler crashes at Karen and Becca's place, and Charlie's son's nanny saves Charlie from a serious parental faux pas(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Waiting for the Miracle. Hank gets a surprise visit from ex-girlfriend Carrie, and when Karen and Becca surprise Hank with an invite to a dinner party, he's compelled to invite her. And frank sex talk among Marcy, Stu and Bates at the event has some guests heading for the exits. Meanwhile, Charlie has a blind date with a woman who lacks experience in the sex department(n)

programme.title: Steve-O: Guilty as Charged
programme.desc: Comedian Steve-O performs outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back(n)

programme.title: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: The protégé of the most skilled mischief maker in college history sets his sights on England's prestigious Camden University to offer an informative course in advanced-level shenanigans in this sequel to the 2002 Ryan Reynolds hit that finds that film's co-star Kal Penn crossing the pond to realize his true party potential. Van Wilder's former assistant has learned the ways of the master, and now he's prepared to share his newfound knowledge with the stuffy students of the school known more for academia than rowdy mischief. Of course, by now Taj (Penn) knows that where there's a will there's a way, and there are plenty of fun-loving misfits at this esteemed institute of higher learning who are just looking for an excuse to ditch their studies and blow off a little steam by embracing their inner Van Wilder(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Harrowing docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: A zany season of a girls' fast-pitch softball team is followed as parents go crazy for wins and the coach is torn between pulling out all the stops in search of victory or actually teaching his players about life and fair play(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: The Death of Superman Lives: What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary look at why the planned 1998 film "Superman Lives" was scrapped. The superhero flick would have starred Nicolas Cage as the Man of Steel and been directed by Tim Burton(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: A fine cast cooks up funny performances in this hilarious urban comedy. When a basketball player (Storm P) signs a $30 million contract, he invites friends and family from the 'hood to a cookout at his estate. But the barbecue doesn't go as planned, as the rich sports star deals with gold diggers, agents, stuffy neighbors and a wacky security guard (writer-producer Queen Latifah). Tim Meadows, Danny Glover, Farrah Fawcett, Ja Rule(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: Jared Paul and Andrew Mogel's comedy The D Train stars Jack Black as Dan, a man in charge of organizing his high-school reunion. In the hopes of getting people to turn out, Dan becomes obsessed with getting Oliver Lawless (James Marsden), a classmate who is the star of a national advertising campaign, to come to the bash. Dan hunts down Oliver in L.A. and uses whatever means he can think of to manipulate Oliver into coming to the event. However, Dan's drive for Oliver's approval causes trouble in his relationships with his family and friends. The D Train screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Gods of Dangerous Financial Instruments. A black comedy about a big-moneymaking management consultant and his high-rolling, low-ethics team. In the premiere episode, they head to New York to concoct a plan for bankers trying to justify their annual bonuses amidst financial chaos(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Amsterdam. The owner of a major sports franchise in Arizona is going through a messy divorce, so the Pod flies to Phoenix to help him over the rough spots. Meanwhile, Jeannie hooks up with a former flame, but cools things when she discovers his ulterior motives; and back at home, Roscoe's penchant for cross-dressing continues to ruffle feathers at school(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Microphallus. Marty learns that MetroCapital is seriously interested in acquiring Galweather-Stearn; the Pod pop on out to Indiana to consult on a beverage-company account; and Clyde has doubts about Doug's encounter with a transvestite. At home, a confused Roscoe has feelings for both a girl and a boy(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Mini-Mogul. When his father heads out of town, Marty decides to take Roscoe on his business trip to San Francisco, but quality time between dad and son takes a backseat to Marty's days being monopolized by the teenage CEO of a software company. Meanwhile, recently engaged Jeannie picks up a musician in a coffeehouse(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Utah. Jeannie has to take charge of the Pod when the racist CEO of a motel chain has reservations about dealing with Marty. Meanwhile, Clyde hopes to hit it off with a lovely Mormon virgin; and when Monica finds she has some free time on her hands, she decides to spend it with Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Our Descent Into Los Angeles. Martin Kihn's hit book, House of Lies: How Management Consultants Steal Your Watch and Then Tell You the Time, is brought to the small screen by Matthew Carnahan (Dirt). The high-stakes corporate world of percentages, profit margins and aggregate turnovers may not sound like a rib-tickling recipe (especially when in the grip of an economic recession) but House of Lies is all about conning the high-stakes corporate world(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Bareback Town. Marty is distracted by a challenge from April during a trip to Washington DC, while father Jeremiah receives some bad news(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Veritas. Marty and The Pod take part in the annual Galweather- Stearn recruiting event, passing on pearls of wisdom to the next generation of business sharks(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Ouroboros. Marty and the Pod's archrivals at Kinsley-Johnson put the consultants through the wringer. Later, Jeannie accidentally leaks her big secret to Marty; and Roscoe and April bond while Marty becomes privy to a secret that Jeremiah has been keeping(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Prologue and Aftermath. Jeannie gets the opportunity to make a big name for herself when she leads the Pod to her hometown, where they hope to resurrect a foundering church. Meanwhile, Marty and Monica meet for a mediation over custody of Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Business. Marty makes an uneasy alliance with 'The Rainmaker', before dealing with the fallout from his split with April in the form of an upset Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: The Mayan Apocalypse. Marty gets help from a surprise source as he deals with MetroCapital's takeover attempt in the Season 1 finale. Meanwhile, Jeannie comes to a decision about her future with Wes; and Roscoe makes a choice that will have a serious impact on his future(n)

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young homeless couple feed their drug addictions through theft, but their lifestyle comes crashing down when one of them is hospitalized(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA man Brad Pitt faces death in a Chinese jail; veteran agent Robert Redford is his only shot at freedom(n)

programme.title: Knock Knock, It's Tig Notaro
programme.desc: Comedian Tig Notaro travels across the U.S. and puts on a series of stand-up performances in the homes, backyards, barns and basements of her most loyal fans, with each intimate show offering the potential for epiphany or disaster(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Profile of an actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood star(n)

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: In this film, teenager Timothy Hutton lives under a cloud of guilt after his brother drowns while trying to rescue the suicide-prone Hutton. Despite intensive therapy sessions, Hutton can't shake the belief that he should have died instead of his brother; nor do his preoccupied parents offer much solace(n)

programme.title: The Seven Five
programme.desc: Profiling a corrupt New York police officer who profited from the drug trade(n)

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Robert Cormier, this psychological crime drama tells the tense story of an obsessed police lieutenant who's on the hunt for a dangerous young killer. The first thing most people notice about handsome high school student Eric Komenko (Jon Foster) is his easy charm. But that charm doesn't run deep, because a closer look reveals a cold-blooded killer. When Eric's devoutly religious mother discovers that her son has been sleeping around, the teen responds to her maternal scolding by viciously slaughtering both she and his father. The man assigned to Eric's case, Lt. Cristofuoro (Russell Crowe), believes that the young psychopath will kill again if given the opportunity. Lt. Cristofuoro knows that Eric has had a rough life, but he's determined to catch him before his murderous impulses once again take over. As Eric hits the road to Syracuse in search of a girl he met in juvenile detention, he is surprised to find Lori Cranston hiding in his truck. A tragic victim of sexual abuse, Lori knows what Eric is capable of, yet remains steadfast in her devotion to him. The crueler Eric is to Lori, the more she desires him. Later, as Lt. Cristofuoro closes in on the pair, Lori embraces her fate as Eric's next victim, and gives herself to him without struggle. But Eric is more interested in the girl from juvenile detention than he is with Lori. Little does the young killer realize that he's walking straight into a carefully set trap(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Ang Lee's adaptation of E. Annie Proulx's story Brokeback Mountain stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Heath Ledger as young cowboys named Jack Twist and Ennis Del Mar. Each of them is hired to corral sheep on the title location and they soon bond very closely. Their platonic relationship explodes into a physical one, but eventually the two are separated when their job comes to an end. Although the two follow different life paths -- one becoming a father of two and the other marrying into a successful business -- they have a reunion years later. Each is affected profoundly by the rekindling of their old feelings for each other. Those feelings lead each to consider what continuing their hidden relationship would cost them. The screenplay was written by Pulitzer Prize-winning author Larry McMurtry and Diana Ossana(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In this achingly beautiful drama, a female department-store employee in 1950s New York falls for a woman stuck in a loveless marriage. Unfortunately, the latter's husband threatens to take their child if the relationship between the two women continues(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part Two
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: In CASINO ROYALE, James Bond goes to a high-stakes poker game in Montenegro to square off against terrorist banker Le Chiffre, an international loan shark who gambles with the money of his equally dangerous clients. Beautiful British Treasury representative Vesper Lynd supplies Bond's own funds, appearing on his arm in Montenegro, while M keeps a close watch on the action from headquarters(n)

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: This gripping thriller takes a stroll down the psycho-path to discover what's eating the young Hannibal Lecter, and how the good doctor developed his appetite for eating his fellow man. Gaspard Ulliel more than ably fills Anthony Hopkins' shoes as the madman who would be Hannibal "The Cannibal." Gong Li, Dominic West, Rhys Ifans, Aaron Thomas, Kevin McKidd, Richard Brake, Helena Lia Tachovska. Directed by Peter Webber and written by Thomas Harris, who adapted his own novel(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: A woman returns to her childhood home in Louisiana following a debilitating car accident, and explores the mysteries of her past while confronting a malevolent ghost(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: Acclaimed music-video director Jesse Peretz made his third feature with this comedy starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman. Tom (Braff) is an aspiring chef whose wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) has just quit her high-paying job to stay home with their new baby. When it becomes abundantly clear that they can no longer maintain their New York City lifestyle, the family picks up and moves to Sofia's hometown in Ohio, where Tom is hired to work at her father's ad agency. It is there that Tom meets Chip (Bateman), the agency's wheelchair-bound golden boy, who also happened to have a one-night stand with Sofia while the two were cheerleaders in high school. Suddenly, Tom finds himself sabotaged by Chip at every step as the nefarious paraplegic schemes to steal Sofia from him and destroy any chance he might have of success at the agency. Released briefly in 2006 under the title Fast Track, the film was retitled The Ex before receiving a wide release in the Spring of 2007(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: After they've broken up, a married movie star couple still have to go out and promote the movie they made together while they were in love, even though they now hate each other. To keep the junket from falling apart when the print of their film doesn't show up, the film's publicist tries to divert attention by concocting the story of the couple's reunion, that everything's still hunky-dory between them... when in fact, the actor is actually in love with his wife's formerly fat assistant and the actress has found a new beau named Hector(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: In Cold Blood. After the assassination of his ambassador, King Henry VIII (Jonathan Rhys Meyers) hungers for war with France, but acquiesces and agrees with a peace plan proffered by Cardinal Wolsey (Sam Neill), who has ulterior motives involving the papacy(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Simply Henry. Henry endangers his peace treaty with France by offering an alliance to Holy Roman Emperor Charles V of Spain; Henry has the final say with a political rival; Elizabeth gives birth to Henry's illegitimate son(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Wolsey, Wolsey, Wolsey!. When Charles V of Spain, the nephew of Queen Katherine of Aragon, visits, Henry tries to hide his lack of affection for his royal wife; Henry meets the beautiful Anne Boleyn and becomes smitten with her(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: His Majesty, the King. As a reward for his denunciation of Martin Luther, the Pope christens Henry "Defender of the Faith," but a brush with death causes the king to seek a solution to his lack of an heir. Princess Margaret reluctantly marries the decrepit King of Portugal, but the union is short-lived; Henry's "desire" for Anne Boleyn intensifies(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Arise, My Lord. The King is shocked when Emperor Charles backs out of their alliance, and he is forced to consider his other options for support in Europe. Meanwhile, Anne Boelyn refuses the King's offer to make her his mistress, intensifying his desire to make her his wife(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: True Love. As Wolsey struggles to have the Church grant him a divorce, King Henry's infatuation with Anne Boleyn continues to grow(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Message to the Emperor. As the plague that is sweeping England threatens Anne's life, Henry anxiously awaits word from the Pope regarding his request for a divorce(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Truth and Justice. Campeggio, legate to the Pope, comes to hear the King's request to divorce Katherine, and despite Wolsey's intimidating tactics, the Pope is not convinced. Wosely is getting short on friends, and in desperation, he begs Katherine to abdicate her marriage(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Look to God First. Confounded by the Catholic church prevaricating over the annulment of his marriage to Catherine of Aragon, Henry turns against Cardinal Wolsey(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: The Death of Wolsey. Poor, alone, and stripped of his former title, Wolsey looks to Katherine for support - a treasonous act, in the eyes of the law. Meanwhile, Henry and Anne Boelyn have an intimate encounter, but she exerts her power over him at the last minute(n)

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg helms his long-in-the-making biopic of Abraham Lincoln for DreamWorks and Touchstone Pictures. Daniel Day-Lewis portrays the former head of state in the Tony Kushner-penned adaptation of Doris Kearns Goodwin's book Team of Rivals, which chronicles the President's time in office between 1861 and 1865 as he dealt with personal demons and politics during the Civil War. Sally Field leads a co-starring cast that includes Tommy Lee Jones, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and Academy Award nominee John Hawkes(n)

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: Jean-Jacques Annaud's WWII thriller is set in war torn Stalingrad, where the Nazis are threatening to overrun the city. Nikita Khrushchev arrives to stiffen the defending troops resolve and decides they need a hero to rally the forces. He finds one in Vassily Zaitsev, a deadly sniper whose expertise soon has the Germans in turmoil. To take him down, and therefore end the Russian's morale-boosted defence, the Germans send in Major Konig, Zaitsev's equal as a sniper, and the war torn ruins of Stalingrad become a deadly hunting ground for the pair(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this chilling remake of the 2002 horror film of the same name, a group of friends head to a remote cabin in the woods for a vacation. However, their fun is soon interrupted by a flesh-eating virus that claims them one-by-one(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Humanitarian-aid workers attempt to save a community's water supply in the war-torn Balkans of 1995, but their mission is complicated by bureaucratic indifference and the possibility that any situation could erupt in sudden violence(n)

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational true story that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they aim for the pros(n)

programme.title: Echoes of War
programme.desc: After the Civil War concludes, a veteran returns home to his Texas countryside ranch. Attempting to rid himself of the horrors of war, he instead finds himself involved in a conflict with a neighboring rancher(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is an American teenager obsessed with Hong Kong cinema and kung-fu classics. One day, he makes an extraordinary discovery in a Chinatown pawnshop -- he finds the legendary fighting stick of Chinese sage and warrior The Monkey King. With the stick in his hands, he is suddenly transported back to ancient China, where he joins an army of fierce warriors. Together, they'll embark in a dangerous quest to free the imprisoned king. Martial arts stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li come together onscreen for the first time ever(n)

As people fight back against the mechanized police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the director's chair for Rocky Balboa, the fifth sequel to the film that made him a superstar 30 years before. The movie begins with Rocky (Stallone) still mourning the death of his loyal and beloved wife, Adrian, who died three years previously after losing a battle against cancer. Rocky owns an Italian restaurant and spends his days living in his working-class Philadelphia neighborhood, visiting with his customers, and telling stories about his past. Starring Sylvester Stallone(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: In this historical drama set during the Cold War, an attorney is tasked with negotiating a prisoner exchange between an American pilot who was shot down over the USSR and a Soviet spy serving a 45-year sentence for espionage against the US(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned drone pilot, who controls spy aircrafts hovering over the Middle East from a trailer in Las Vegas, begins to feel morally disconnected from his military orders in this timely drama(n)

programme.title: American Jihad

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: Roger Donaldson's bank heist conspiracy-thriller - scripted by Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais - stars Jason Statham as the leader of a gang of thieves who bite off more than they can chew. When car dealer and one-time crook Terry Leather is approached by his old flame Martine Love with a proposition that would put his money worries behind him for good, he jumps at the chance. Leather quickly assembles a team which digs a tunnel directly into a London bank's vault. But what he hasn't been told is that, in addition to the money, he'll also be stealing a safety box containing material that, if it saw the light of day, would be extremely damaging to the royal family. Another box they take holds further dramatic revelations concerning establishment figures. So it's not long before Leather and the gang are pursued by the police, MI5 and various thugs, all keen to get their hands on the incendiary information..(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Witnesses to an assassination attempt against the president, including Secret Service agents Kent Taylor (Matthew Fox) and Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid), come away with sharply differing impressions of who did what to whom Barnes tries to piece together the shocking truth from the contradictory evidence and accounts. Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Wily band manager Mr White helps a small town band achieve big time success when they release a Beatles-style pop song in 1964. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks for some reason decided to wait a decade before spoofing Star Wars and its ilk, and ten years was certainly too long to wait for this relatively weak offering from the comedy director. That said, there are a fair few laughs, mostly from Rick Moranis as Vader clone Dark Helmet and the late John Candy as the reliable space dog, Barf(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Ben Stiller's dark satire about the power of television charts a yuppie's descent into a personal hell. After Matthew Broderick splits up with his girlfriend and moves into a new flat he invites Jim Carrey to install his cable TV. But things soon take a dark turn as Carrey decides to become Broderick's best friend before stalking him, taking over his family, his girlfriend and his life(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Wily band manager Mr White helps a small town band achieve big time success when they release a Beatles-style pop song in 1964. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Running Scared

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers (Kristen Wiig and Melissa McCarthy) join forces with a nuclear engineer (Kate McKinnon) and a subway attendant (Leslie Jones) to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings. Chris Hemsworth co-stars as the ladies' hunky receptionist. Paul Feig (Bridesmaids) directed this reboot of the 1980s franchise; Ivan Reitman, director of both the original film and Ghostbusters II, produced(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Rent. Claire goes along on the MacKenzies' trip to collect rents, and witnesses Dougal using Jamie's scars to elicit sympathy for the cause of the Jacobites. Later, she realises a momentous event in Scottish history is coming up fast(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVII. Silver and his men track Flint on Skeleton Island; Madi receives an offer; Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor; Billy casts his lot(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: 1991. Secrets from the past are uncovered as Julien finally learns the truth behind Alice and Sophie's abduction. But time is running out, and nobody in Eckhausen will listen to him. Has Julien cracked the case, or is he simply deluded? With nowhere left to turn, how far will Julien go in his search to find the truth?(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: A detective tracking a serial killer gives up all hope of solving the crimes and moves to another city. After he's settled in, the old acquaintance makes himself known. The serial killer has resurrected and begins sending him new pictures of new victims(n)

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Johnny Depp gives a virtuoso performance in this terrifying psycho-thriller based on the novella by Stephen King. Depp plays an author suffering from writer's block who becomes totally unhinged after he is accused of plagiarism by a menacing stranger (John Turturro)(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: After finding herself stuck on an out-of-control bus in the first movie, Sandra Bullock's feisty heroine Annie returns for a new adventure. Annie thinks her new boyfriend, Alex (Jason Patric), is a policeman and she wants him to stop putting his life in danger. What Alex hasn't told her is that he's actually a SWAT team member, which means he's engaged in some of the most dangerous activities imaginable! When Annie finds out the truth, Alex decides to apologise by taking her on a romantic cruise. But fate conspires to ruin their holiday when disgruntled ex-employee Geiger (Willem Dafoe) decides to forego an industrial tribunal in favour of blowing up the boat owned by the company which fired him! As the now out-of-control cruise ship hurtles towards potential destruction and Annie gets herself into a series of risky scrapes, Alex dangles, dives, swings and leaps his way around the ship, rescuing passengers in distress and desperately searching for a way to prevent his romantic cruise from having an explosive ending(n)

The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks for some reason decided to wait a decade before spoofing Star Wars and its ilk, and ten years was certainly too long to wait for this relatively weak offering from the comedy director. That said, there are a fair few laughs, mostly from Rick Moranis as Vader clone Dark Helmet and the late John Candy as the reliable space dog, Barf(n)

Paul Feig (Bridesmaids) directed this reboot of the 1980s franchise; Ivan Reitman, director of both the original film and Ghostbusters II, produced(n)

programme.desc: Rent. Claire goes along on the MacKenzies' trip to collect rents, and witnesses Dougal using Jamie's scars to elicit sympathy for the cause of the Jacobites. Later, she realises a momentous event in Scottish history is coming up fast(n)

programme.desc: Johnny Depp gives a virtuoso performance in this terrifying psycho-thriller based on the novella by Stephen King. Depp plays an author suffering from writer's block who becomes totally unhinged after he is accused of plagiarism by a menacing stranger (John Turturro)(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: After finding herself stuck on an out-of-control bus in the first movie, Sandra Bullock's feisty heroine Annie returns for a new adventure. Annie thinks her new boyfriend, Alex (Jason Patric), is a policeman and she wants him to stop putting his life in danger. What Alex hasn't told her is that he's actually a SWAT team member, which means he's engaged in some of the most dangerous activities imaginable! When Annie finds out the truth, Alex decides to apologise by taking her on a romantic cruise. Thriller, based on a true story. He created humanity but was locked off from dominating Earth by the absence of the Stargate. Now that the Stargate is open again, he's ready to return unless he can be stopped..(n)

programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Writer-director Scott Frank, who scripted the screen adaptations of Elmore Leonard's "Get Shorty" and "Out of Sight," scores a winner with this gripping noirish caper saga. Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as a bank janitor who falls in with thieves who are planning to rob his workplace. When he has second thoughts about participating, they ratchet up the pressure with threats to some innocent outsiders. Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode, Isla Fisher, Carla Gugino, Bruce McGill, Sergio Di Zio(n)

programme.desc: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Ace Israeli commando Zohan Dvir fakes his own death so he can realise his dreams of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Rob Schneider and Anna Faris star in this body-swap comedy. A cheerleader learns a humiliating lesson when some magical earrings make her switch bodies with a male crook(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: In this biblical suspense drama, Roman soldier Clavius (Joseph Fiennes) and his partner Lucius (Tom Felton) are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during the course of their investigation. Directed by Kevin Reynolds(n)

programme.title: The Grey Zone
programme.desc: Actor, writer, and director Tim Blake Nelson adapts this grim look at the holocaust from his own play, based on Miklos Nyiszli's book, Auschwitz: A Doctor's Eyewitness Account. The film centers on the sonderkommando: Jewish concentration camp prisoners whose job was to herd their fellow Jews into the gas chamber, and to dispose of the bodies following the execution. In return, these prisoners received food and a little more time before their own executions. As the members of the sonderkommando struggle to orchestrate what would be the only armed insurrection in Auschwitz, a group of them discover a 14-year-old girl who somehow survived the gas chamber. The girl becomes a symbol for their own spiritual salvation and they become obsessed with keeping the girl alive, even if it endangers the uprising that could save thousands. This film was screened at the 2001 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their initial career lasted only 26 months, the Sex Pistols changed the music scene forever. This intimate and shocking portrait of the notorious punk rock band documents their rise from the streets of 70's London through their crucifixion by the tabloids, canonization by fans around the world and ultimately their implosion on tour in America(n)

programme.title: Where Do We Go Now?
programme.desc: Women try to persuade their men to put a stop to war in this fusion of comedy and drama from director, screenwriter, and actress Nadine Labaki. Amale (Labaki) runs a café in a small Lebanese village where the local women, both Christian and Muslim, get together to talk, swap ideas, and share grief as the number who've lost sons or husbands in frequent skirmishes continues to grow. The fighting between religious and political factions has been going on for years, and one day Amale and her friends Afaf (Layla Hakim), Saydeh (Antoinette Noufaily), Takla (Claude Baz Moussawbaa), and Yvonne (Yvonne Maalouf) decide it's time to stop talking about the fighting and do something to bring it to a halt. The local women join forces to distract their men, convinced if they put their minds on other things they won't worry so much about killing. Their efforts range from serving hashish-laced baked goods at a community get-together to hiring Ukrainian dancers to show off their charms to the menfolk. After a young man is killed in a gun battle, the women realize they need to take a stronger stand if they intend to make their home safe again; meanwhile, Christian Amale unwittingly strikes a blow for religious unity when she falls for handsome Muslim Rabih (Julien Farhat). Et Maintenant On Va Ou? (aka Where Do We Go Now?) won the People's Choice Award at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Lovely & Amazing
programme.desc: Brenda Blethyn plays a mother to grown up daughters Catherine Keener, an 'artist', and Emily Mortimer, an actress plus Raven Goodwin, who is adopted and just eight. Nicole Holofcener celebrates their lives, loves and misfortunes in this perceptive, sometimes funny, sometimes tragic gem of a film(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighbourhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a miracle by a nosy neighbour ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life(n)

programme.title: Weepah Way for Now
programme.desc: Two musician sisters throw a going-away party before heading out on tour, but the presence of their divorced parents and two of their exes ruins the fun(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Kinky Boots

Sarah-Jane Potts, Ewan Hooper. Directed by Julian Jarrold(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: Once a beloved celebrity who won an Olympic bronze medal in gymnastics while performing with a ruptured Achilles, Hope Ann Greggory (Melissa Rauch) is now a washed-up has-been relying on her past fame to get by. However, opportunity knocks when she is offered the chance to train a promising teenage tumbler (Haley Lu Richardson) in exchange for a financial windfall. Greggory is soon torn between the money and her desire to remain the most famous person in her hometown. Gary Cole, Thomas Middleditch, Sebastian Stan, and Cecily Strong co-star. Directed by Bryan Buckley(n)

programme.desc: In this riveting drama, an alcoholic couple are torn apart when the wife decides to get sober in order to keep her job as an elementary-school teacher and repair her relationship with her mother(n)

programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.desc: A mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: Rogue lobsters, spiders "as big as a Buick" and a romance that blossoms in the Manhattan spring. With its irresistible brand of bittersweet comedy, the story of stand-up comic Alvy Singer and his nervy wooing of free-spirited Annie Hall won Best Picture in 1977(n)

programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: When an aspiring singer is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover, she meets a tabloid darling and headline singer who is in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Irish playwright Martin McDonagh brings crackling dialogue and pitch-black humour to this tale about hit men laying low after a botched job. Exiled to picturesque Bruges, Belgium, partners Ken and Ray kill time in pubs, museums and medieval churches while awaiting word from their sociopathic boss. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton is a barber in a sleepy '40s town whose wife (Frances McDormand) is having an affair with her boss James Gandolfini. But when he's offered a get-rich-quick scheme, his plans to raise the money lead to blackmail, murder, death-row for his wife, an expensive city lawyer (Tony Shalhoub) and then, by a savage irony, his own appointment with the electric chair for a crime he didn't commit. The Coen Brothers' Oscar-nominated Hitchcockian tribute to the film noir genre is sparked with humour, darkness and outstanding performances(n)

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist schemes to get out of prison by convincing his debauched wife to seduce his retirement-ready parole officer in director John J. Curran's adaptation of a play by Angus MacLachlan (who also authored the screenplay). His career as a parole officer winding down after years of service, Jack Mabry (Robert De Niro) reluctantly accepts an assignment to reassess inmate Gerald "Stone" Creeson's (Edward Norton) case for an upcoming parole hearing. Convicted of setting a fire to make the murder of his grandparents look like an accidental death, Stone will do anything to get out from behind bars, and his wife, Lucetta (Milla Jovovich), is willing to do whatever it takes to help secure her husband's freedom -- including seducing Jack. Meanwhile, Jack's devoted wife, Madylyn (Frances Conroy), has suffered with the emotional weight of her husband's demanding job for far too long(n)

programme.title: Hi-Life
programme.desc: Eric Stoltz stars in this comedy of errors as a man whose gambling debts lead to an ever-widening circle of lies. He enlists his girlfriend to help raise the money, and his fabricated sob story is so compelling that she creates her own lie to get money from her brother (Campbell Scott), owner of the Hi-Life bar, who in turn seeks help from various friends and an ex-lover. Moira Kelly, Daryl Hannah, Katrin Cartlidge(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Two garbage men's lives are turned upside down when they discover the city commissioner's body in a trash bin on their route. Over the next 24 hours, they frantically try to keep the body hidden, elude underworld goons and find the real killer(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: Police pup Shoeshine is disgraced after a poor performance, but an accident sees him doused in superpowers and ready to save the day. Family action(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa(n)

programme.title: Melinda and Melinda
programme.desc: Woody Allen's bittersweet drama stars Radha Mitchell in two roles but both as the eponymous Melinda. One Melinda is the neighbour of indie filmmaker Susan and her "resting" actor husband Hobie, whom Melinda tempts towards adultery. The other Melinda is friends with Laura and her alcoholic husband Lee, a serial adulterer with designs on Melinda. Playing one set of circumstances for comedy and the other for tragedy, and cutting between the two scenarios throughout, the film is a fascinating study of characters, and keeps the viewer guessing until the very end(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged slackers become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Hi-Life
programme.desc: Eric Stoltz stars in this comedy of errors as a man whose gambling debts lead to an ever-widening circle of lies. He enlists his girlfriend to help raise the money, and his fabricated sob story is so compelling that she creates her own lie to get money from her brother (Campbell Scott), owner of the Hi-Life bar, who in turn seeks help from various friends and an ex-lover. Moira Kelly, Daryl Hannah, Katrin Cartlidge(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: There's no need to change your dollars to euros for this hilarious sequel to the 1999 surprise hit that finds Deuce (Rob Schneider) investigating the murders of male prostitutes in Amsterdam and trying to exonerate his old pimp (Eddie Griffin). Jeroen Krabbe, Til Schweiger, Douglas Sills, Carlos Ponce, Hanna Verboom, Miranda Raison, Charles Keating(n)

programme.title: She's the One
programme.desc: The two Fitzpatrick brothers, Mickey and Francis, would appear to have little in common. When Mickey meets up with his ex-fiance Heather, the two decide to finish exchanging belongings. When Heather gives Francis (her current lover) the watch Mickey just returned to her, complications multiply(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: The up-and-down-and-up-again story of musician Dewey Cox, whose songs would change a nation. On his rock 'n roll spiral, Cox sleeps with 411 women, marries three times, has 22 kids and 14 step-kids, stars in his own 70s TV show, collects friends ranging from Elvis to the Beatles to a chimp, and gets addicted to - and then kicks - every drug known to man; but despite it all, Cox grows into a national icon and eventually earns the love of a good woman - longtime backup singer Darlene(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged slackers become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo

Jeroen Krabbe, Til Schweiger, Douglas Sills, Carlos Ponce, Hanna Verboom, Miranda Raison, Charles Keating(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Action-packed espionage comedy about a veteran CIA agent who recruits the twin brother of his dead partner to thwart a terrorist plot involving a nuclear bomb(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars as a writer on assignment who goes on a drug-fueled binge in Las Vegas with his lawyer, Dr Gonzo. Adapted from Hunter S. Thompson's 1971 novel(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: A charming-as-ever Diane Keaton stars as a desperate housewife who gets a job as a janitor at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other low-level employees (Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. Oscar-winning screenwriter Callie Khouri ("Thelma & Louise") directed. Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Johnny Be Good
programme.desc: Anthony Michael Hall stars as Johnny Walker, a much sought-after high school football star whom every collegiate program wants for their own(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Newly fired sports agent Jerry Maguire carves out his own career, signing a star pro-football player and falling for new employee Dorothy Boyd. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Someone like You
programme.desc: "Don't underestimate casual sex, Janey, it's very liberating." Dumped by slimeball Ray, TV researcher Jane is forced to flatshare with womanising Eddie. It's not ideal, but sometimes Mr Right turns up in the least expected place(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.desc: Action-packed espionage comedy about a veteran CIA agent who recruits the twin brother of his dead partner to thwart a terrorist plot involving a nuclear bomb(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Newly fired sports agent Jerry Maguire carves out his own career, signing a star pro-football player and falling for new employee Dorothy Boyd. Comedy drama(n)

Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Second World War drama in which a former law student - now a lieutenant in the army - is forced to defend himself and two black officers after a murder occurs in the POW camp to which they have been sent. Meanwhile, a wily colonel plans to use the distraction of the investigation to plot a daring escape(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds(n)

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey, the key witness to a mobster's murder, has one small problem: he is suffering from amnesia and can't even remember his own name!(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: One man's efforts to get ahead on the streets lead him into a life of danger in this hard-hitting urban drama from Roc-A-Fella Films, the production company run by top hip-hop artist Jay-Z. Beans (Beanie Sigel) is a member of a Philadelphia street gang who has had enough of his life of poverty. Determined to get ahead by any means available to him, Beans steps to the wrong side of the law and begins selling drugs. Forming a crew with his friends and fellow gangsters called the ABM ("All 'Bout the Money"), Beans and his partners soon become the new rulers of Philly's underground economy. But with success comes competition, and Untouchable J (Jay-Z) and Dame (Damon Dash), the leaders of an establish drug-dealing crew, decide the ABM are taking more than their share of the business, and begin retaliating with violence -- with both the ABM crew and Beans' wife as targets. State Property also stars Memphis Bleek, Omillio Sparks, and Sundy Carter(n)

programme.title: Waiting to Exhale
programme.desc: A surprise Hollywood hit, this film is based on the novel of the same name by Terry McMillan and centers on four well-to-do African-American women and their relationships with men and one another. All of them are "holding their breath" until the day they can feel comfortable in a committed relationship with a man. Robin (Lela Rochon) is the long-time mistress of Russell (Leon), who keeps reneging on his promise to leave his wife for her. She dumps him to find a man she can have to herself, but her dates with a reliable but unattractive business partner (Wendell Pierce) and a drug addict (Mykelti Williamson) send her back to Russell. Savannah (Whitney Houston) is a successful television producer who also believes that her married lover Kenneth (Dennis Haysbert) will leave his wife. Bernadine (Angela Bassett) is a wealthy woman who abandoned her own career to raise a family. Her husband is now leaving her to marry a white woman. Gloria (Loretta Devine) is a beauty salon owner and single mother raising a teenage son. After years alone, she falls in love with a new neighbor, Marvin (Gregory Hines). The women share their stories over lunches and conversations at Gloria's salon(n)

programme.title: Blue Chips
programme.desc: Pete Bell, a college basketball coach is under a lot of pressure. His team isn't winning and he cannot attract new players. The stars of the future are secretly being paid by boosters. This practice is forbidden in the college game, but Pete is desperate and has pressures from all around(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: Will Smith reunites with "The Pursuit of Happyness" director Gabriele Muccino for this emotionally intense story of an IRS agent harboring a secret who embarks on a journey of redemption by trying to change the lives of seven strangers. Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson, Michael Ealy, Barry Pepper, Elpidia Carrillo(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Second World War drama in which a former law student - now a lieutenant in the army - is forced to defend himself and two black officers after a murder occurs in the POW camp to which they have been sent. Meanwhile, a wily colonel plans to use the distraction of the investigation to plot a daring escape(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects
programme.desc: Three psychopathic family members go on a killing spree as a vengeful sheriff tracks their trail in this gory sequel to House of 1000 Corpses(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: One man's efforts to get ahead on the streets lead him into a life of danger in this hard-hitting urban drama from Roc-A-Fella Films, the production company run by top hip-hop artist Jay-Z. Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson, Michael Ealy, Barry Pepper, Elpidia Carrillo(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A Rhode Island state trooper (Jim Carrey) with a split personality tries to protect a lovely con artist (Renee Zellweger) from foul play in this hilarious film by the Farrelly brothers. The situation becomes even more complicated when each of the officer's personalities begins to fall for the young woman. Chris Cooper, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee, Jerod Mixon(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Compelling Civil War drama based on a true story. A regiment of black soldiers, led by a rookie white officer, fight both the Confederacy and racism within their own ranks(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Left for dead by a gang of ruthless vampires who forced him to witness the slaughter of his own family, ex-Army Ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) vows to put every last one of the vicious bloodsuckers back in the ground where they belong. Later, as Shawn tracks down the hive's magnetic leader Cain (Vinnie Jones) and his loyal servant Vanya (Kat Von D), he realizes this is one job he can't handle on his own. Fortunately for Shawn, Reverend Ray (Michael Madsen) is there to help him realize his true potential as a "slayer", one of the few remaining humans with the power to defeat the living dead. DMX and Armand Assante co-star(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Thriller about a killer stalking a group of FBI profilers who've gathered for a weekend of training(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Chiwetel Ejiofor co-star in writer/director David Mamet's martial arts drama Redbelt. Ejiofor plays Mike Terry, a jujitsu master who co-runs a very modest martial arts studio in Los Angeles with his bossy wife, Sondra (Alice Braga). Mike demonstrates an unwavering commitment to his craft and draws a cadre of defiantly loyal pupils including Joe (Max Martini), an LAPD cop. All told, it appears that he has chosen a peaceful and conflict-free path in life. The dedicated martial artist's fate takes an unanticipated turn, however, one evening when a young woman named Laura (Emily Mortimer) bursts into the academy in a state of near hysteria, and reaches for a policeman's gun when he tries to restrain her. One thing leads to another, and before long, Laura is regularly receiving martial arts lessons from Mike. As master begins to teach pupil and his martial arts philosophies emerge, his path also crisscrosses with that of a Hollywood movie star, Chet Frank (Tim Allen), when he saves the fellow from a beating at a local club and gets invited (along with Sondra) to Chet's house for dinner. Chet extends gestures of friendship, and Mike's guard breaks down; he speaks openly and candidly of a special martial arts method he employs that requires one of the participants to "assume a handicap." In time, the association with Chet leads to involvement in the motion-picture industry, and relations with a bevy of characters who aren't exactly what they seem -- including a pay-per-view fight mogul (Ricky Jay) and Chet's slimy and manipulative manager (Joe Mantegna)(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Compelling Civil War drama based on a true story. A regiment of black soldiers, led by a rookie white officer, fight both the Confederacy and racism within their own ranks(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.desc: A Rhode Island state trooper (Jim Carrey) with a split personality tries to protect a lovely con artist (Renee Zellweger) from foul play in this hilarious film by the Farrelly brothers. The situation becomes even more complicated when each of the officer's personalities begins to fall for the young woman. Chris Cooper, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee, Jerod Mixon(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Compelling Civil War drama based on a true story. A regiment of black soldiers, led by a rookie white officer, fight both the Confederacy and racism within their own ranks(n)

programme.title: Rhyme & Reason
programme.desc: Rhyme and Reason features some of the biggest stars in rap music discussing the history and impact of hip hop and rap music. Director Peter Spirer takes a sociological approach to this primarily African American art form, focusing more on interviews and historical facts than on presenting examples of the diverse musical genre itself. Those offering insights include Ice-T, Chuck-D, KRS-ONE, Notorious B.I.G., and Wu Tang Clan. Female rappers Salt and Pepa, Da Brat and the Fugees' Lauren Hill offer their thoughts on rap music and misogyny. Also examined is the controversy over the violent lyrics found in gangsta rap. In the film's latter stages, the filmmakers attend rapper Tupac Shakur's funeral(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A baseball legend almost finished with his distinguished career at the age of thirty-seven has one last chance to prove who he is, what he is capable of and win the heart of the woman he has loved for the past four years. As he pitches that night, he must decide whether to accept the trade or quit the game he loves, and between innings, he recalls meeting Jane, their first date, happy times, miscommunication, and what may be a final break. Meanwhile, with Vin Scully announcing, one Yankee batter after another fails to reach first base. Can Billy pitch a perfect game, and if so, what does it matter if he loses Jane?(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: This sequel to the smash-hit comic-book epic The Avengers finds the iconic superhero team dealing with a threat of their own making: a sentient robot called Ultron (voice of James Spader), who was originally designed as part of a peacekeeping program. Since the events of the last film, Captain America (Chris Evans), Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner), and Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) have been working to take down various cells of a secret society of villains known as HYDRA. Their zeal to make the world a better, safer place inspires Tony Stark, genius billionaire and alter ego of Iron Man, to create Ultron in order to respond to additional threats that the Avengers aren't able to handle. Ultron, unfortunately, takes this directive way too seriously -- he believes that world peace can only be achieved by exterminating humanity, and he'll stop at nothing to accomplish this goal. The battle between the Avengers and Ultron is further complicated by the appearance of superpowered siblings Quicksilver (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) and Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen), who ally themselves with the homicidal android. Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders co-star as, respectively, S.H.I.E.L.D. operatives Nick Fury and Maria Hill. Joss Whedon, writer and director of the previous Avengers movie, returns in both capacities here(n)

programme.title: Franny's Feet
programme.desc: Lots of Space; Tulip Parade. Franny travels to the space station, where she meets a young astronaut and learns about life in space; Franny visits the Netherlands, where she learns about Dutch traditions and creates a flowery float for a parade(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: Patch Wants to Fly; Making Colours; The Day It Snowed in Springtime
programme.desc: Patch Wants to Fly; Making Colours; The Day It Snowed in Springtime. Connie teaches Dodger the cat not to play pranks; they learn that nature is always changing(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: The Treasure Hunt; Paddington Goes to Hollywood; Mr. Gruber's Mystery Tour
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt; Paddington Goes to Hollywood; Mr. Gruber's Mystery Tour. Paddington decides to dig for buried treasure; Paddington gets to play "The Claw" in a big Hollywood movie; Mr. Gruber and Paddington embark on a mystery tour which takes them to a waxworks museum(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: Witchy Grrrls. Sabrina forms a rock band to enter into a town talent show and uses magic to make the group better(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: Allies at Last. The victory at Saratoga enables Franklin (voice of Walter Cronkite) to persuade France to side with the Americans. Meanwhile, Sarah and Henri spend time with British troops in occupied Philadelphia, while James learns a lesson in religious freedom. Other voices include Reo Jones (Sarah), Kathleen Barr (Henri) and Chris Lundquist (James)(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Two children discover a mysterious board game in their attic. As they roll the dice, out pops crazy Alan -a man who has been trapped inside for 26 years - and a jungle-full of wild animals(n)

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: Remake of the 1947 film about a youngster whose scepticism about Santa is challenged by a man claiming to be Kriss Kringle(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron

programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this thrilling continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Two children discover a mysterious board game in their attic. As they roll the dice, out pops crazy Alan -a man who has been trapped inside for 26 years - and a jungle-full of wild animals(n)

Their zeal to make the world a better, safer place inspires Tony Stark, genius billionaire and alter ego of Iron Man, to create Ultron in order to respond to additional threats that the Avengers aren't able to handle. Ultron, unfortunately, takes this directive way too seriously -- he believes that world peace can only be achieved by exterminating humanity, and he'll stop at nothing to accomplish this goal. The battle between the Avengers and Ultron is further complicated by the appearance of superpowered siblings Quicksilver (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) and Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen), who ally themselves with the homicidal android. Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders co-star as, respectively, S.H.I.E.L.D. operatives Nick Fury and Maria Hill. Joss Whedon, writer and director of the previous Avengers movie, returns in both capacities here(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Changing of the Guard. Written by Rod Serling, this nostalgic Twilight Zone episode was clearly inspired by Serling's student years at Ohio's Antioch College. Made up to look twice his age, Donald Pleasence stars as Prof. Ellis Fowler, the oldest teacher at an exclusive boy's school. Ordered by his headmaster (Liam Sullivan) to retire, Fowler is convinced that his life has been meaningless -- until he is paid a nocturnal visit by several ethereal-looking "alumni." Telecast June 1, 1962, "The Changing of the Guard" was scheduled as the final Twilight Zone of the 1961-62 season -- and at the time, it looked as if it would be the last Twilight Zone, period. Though the series would ultimately be renewed in January of 1963, it would never completely rescale the creative heights of its first three seasons(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In His Image. When Alan Talbot (George Grizzard) returns to his home town after a week's absence, he finds that there have been a few significant changes, chief among them the fact that a stranger is living in his house. At a loss to explain this and other curiosities to his fiancée Jessica Connelly (Gail Kobe), Alan determines to get to the bottom of things. Meanwhile, the viewers would like a few answers of their own -- namely, why did Alan murder a harmless old woman before the first commercial? Scripted by Charles Beaumont from his own short story, "In His Image" was the first of Twilight Zone's 60-minute episodes, and it originally aired January 3, 1963(n)

When Remy (Jude Law) fails to keep up on payments for his recent heart transplant, his former partner vows to take back the organ by force if necessary. Meanwhile, Remy finds an unexpected ally in the form of his long-lost wife, Beth (Alice Braga), who has also been retrofitted with numerous artificial organs. Now, despite the fact that they haven't seen each other since Remy joined the army ten years ago, the desperate repo man and his sympathetic wife attempt a daring escape from a man who holds the lives of millions in the palm of his hands. This episode is a spoof of a famous "sweatshop" scandal involving the franchised consumer products of a certain popular female TV talkshow host (are we being obscure enough here?) In their efforts to win a huge raise, Al (Ed O'Neill) and Griff (Harold Sylvester) resort to blackmail when they discover that their boss Gary is using illegal aliens to manufacture her shoes. Unfortunately, the plan fizzles (despite an extended takeoff of the Mission: Impossible films), and Al's son Bud (David Faustino) ends up atoning for his dad's sins. programme.title: Kicking & Screaming
programme.desc: Immaturity and poor sportsmanship once again find their firmly established place in children's athletics (at least among the adults) in this sports comedy. Phil Weston (Will Ferrell) is a tightly wound suburban father who had a competitive streak worn into him by his father, Buck (Robert Duvall), who never seemed to feel that his son measured up. When Phil's son joins a Little League soccer team, Phil signs on as coach, only to learn that Buck -- who also has a ten-year-old son these days -- will be coaching a team in the same league. Determined to show his father he can do the job, Phil impresses upon his young charges that winning is the only important thing, and soon gains a few enemies as he humiliates not only the kids on his own team, but their opponents as well. Directed by Jesse Dylan, Kicking & Screaming also features Kate Walsh and legendary football coach Mike Ditka. The screenplay was authored by Steve Rudnick and Leo Benvenuti (The Santa Clause) prior to the latter's death in 2000(n)

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes returns as legendary vampire hunter Blade in this, the third film inspired by the popular Marvel Comics character. A fearless warrior immune to vampires, Blade (Snipes) has become a hated enemy of the bloodsucking community, and as they gather in their desert compound, a group of vampires is plotting to eliminate Blade once and for all by turning the mortal community against him. The vampires have concocted a misinformation campaign that paints a picture of Blade as a ruthless murderer and has sent the FBI on the vampire hunter's trail, led by the relentless agent Cumberland (James Remar). At the same time, the vampires have brought their founding father, Dracula, back to his undead state, renaming him Drake (Dominic Purcell) and investing him with special powers that allow him to walk unharmed in daylight. After a dangerous encounter with Cumberland, Blade and his ally, Whistler (Kris Kristofferson), form an uneasy alliance with a scruffy team of human vampire slayers, the Nighstalkers, led by Hannibal King (Ryan Reynolds), and Whistler's daughter, Abigail (Jessica Biel. While Sommerfield (Natasha Lyonne), a biologist working with the Nightstalkers, researches a scientific answer to the vampire problem, Blade and his comrades take a more hands-on approach against Drake and his minions, including Danica Talos (Parker Posey), Asher (Callum Keith Rennie), and Grimwood (Triple H). Blade: Trinity was directed by David Goyer, who also wrote the screenplay for this film, as well as the first two movies in the series(n)
